AfterShow.Name: init
AfterShow.Source: const UC = this;	const containerEl = document.getElementById(UC.ContainerName);	var el = containerEl.getElementsByTagName("input")[0];	var label = containerEl.getElementsByTagName("label")[0];	el.setAttribute("id", "switch" + UC.ControlId);	el.setAttribute("aria-checked", el.checked)	label.setAttribute("for", "switch" + UC.ControlId);	label.innerHTML = "switch" + UC.ControlId;		const controlValueChanged = function(){		if (UC.ControlValueChanged){			el.setAttribute("aria-checked", UC.getAttribute())			UC.ControlValueChanged()		}	}		el.addEventListener("change", controlValueChanged);	containerEl.addEventListener("keydown", function(ev){		if (ev.code == "Space" || ev.code == "Enter") {			el.checked = !el.checked			UC.setAttribute(el.checked)			controlValueChanged();		}	})
